.zshrc.notes: zsh config. Requires oh-my-zsh framework. Use with .LS_COLORS and agnoster-mod.zsh-theme. Requires `xclip` package for copy-paste.

.LS_COLORS.notes: Set of LS_COLORS parameters. Required by .zshrc

agnoster-mod.zsh-theme.notes: Modified agnoster theme for oh-my-zsh. Required by .zshrc
